ch.nolix.common.module

Class Module

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.common.module.Module
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILevel1Controller, ILevel2Controller, ILevel3Controller, CodeNamed
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlphaServer, DesignManager

    public abstract class Module
extends java.lang.Object
implements CodeNamed, ILevel3Controller
    A module is a level 3 controller that has: -a code name -a directory. -a central controller
